title: Topic 004 Question 015
body: A company has an Azure Virtual Network gateway named VNetGW1. The company enables point-to-site connectivity on VNetGW1. An administrator configures VNetGW1 for the following:
• Azure certificate for the authentication type.
Users receive a certificate mismatch error when connecting by using a VPN client.
You need to resolve the certificate mismatch error.
options: Reissue the client certificate with client authentication enabled.
Create a profile manually, add the server FQDN and reissue the client certificate.
Reissue the client certificate with server identity validation disabled.
Configure preshared key for authentication on the VPN profile.
